programme.title: Wildest Africa: Nile: An African Odyssey
programme.desc: The Nile is the longest river in the world. Ancient Egypt, one of the history's most powerful civilizations, depended hugely upon it. Each year, it flooded, replenishing the fields with fertile silt. This automatic irrigation fueled Egypt's economy.

programme.title: Australia's Wild Places: The Red Desert
programme.desc: In this episode of Wild Places, we join botanist Peter Latz, who believes the biggest influence on the Australian arid landscape has been fire. Years ago, Peter wondered how different this country would have looked like without the influence of it.

programme.title: Wildest India: Thar Desert: Sacred Sands
programme.desc: Covering 200,000 km sq, India's Thar desert is one of the harshest places on Earth. Desiccating winds and near permanent drought has earned this unforgiving land another name: the region of death.

programme.title: Wildest Africa: Lake Turkana: Land of the Crocodile
programme.desc: The largest of Africa's Rift valley lakes, Lake Turkana is at the heart of one of the harshest landscapes on the planet. Despite its hostile environment, man and beast have both worked out a way to survive.

programme.title: Wildest Latin America: Amazon: One Jungle, Many Worlds
programme.desc: The Amazon is the largest rainforest in the world, and the richest ecosystem on earth. This film uncovers what makes the Amazon such a powerhouse of evolution; how it has come to home a third of all species on the planet.

programme.title: The Ninth Gate
programme.desc: A rare book dealer, while seeking out the last two copies of a demon text, gets drawn into a conspiracy with supernatural overtones. Starring: Johnny Depp, Frank Langella, Lena Olin

programme.title: Big Momma's House
programme.desc: In order to protect a woman from a robber, a male FBI agent disguises himself as an elderly woman.

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: When Rodney Baze mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother Russell takes matters into his own hands to find justice.

programme.title: The Violent Years
programme.desc: Jam Handy shows the world the glory of sexism with electric kitchen appliances and Ed Wood analyzes the world of criminals spoiled by their parents.

programme.title: Hamlet

programme.title: The Sword And The Dragon

programme.desc: When Crow is asked to convince an old friend of Martha's to move into her retirement home, Crow decides to tackle the task by challenging the old man to a trash-talking junkyard duel. Can Crow convince the old man to relocate?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: A Duel with Interest
programme.desc: When a loan shark starts sinking his teeth into New Domino City, Jack decides to reel in this money-grubbing menace for good by putting his most prized possessions on the line in a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: The Wicked Spirits
programme.desc: When Leo and Luna decide to go exploring a nearby forest rumored to be haunted by wicked spirits, they soon discover that the rumors are all too real when a mysterious boy traps Luna in his house and challenges Leo to a duel.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: French Twist: Part I
programme.desc: Yusei wakes up to find himself trapped in the back of a big rig with a bump on his head and no way out. After a mysterious tip leads Akiza to Yusei's location, the two friends soon find themselves Turbo Dueling an unfamiliar foe.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's: French Twist: Part II
programme.desc: As the battle between Yusei and Sherry races on, Sherry reveals some shocking secrets about the upcoming World Racing Grand Prix. Meanwhile, Akiza begins to gain a new understanding and appreciation for Turbo Dueling while riding shotgun to Yusei.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: Still on Seefra, Dylan finds Harper, who has adjusted to life there.

programme.title: Andromeda
programme.desc: It turns out Doyle is an android, built by Harper to contain Rommie's core programming.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Psychics Revealed - Special
programme.desc: Behind the scenes with the psychics on the show.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: The Lie of the Land
programme.desc: Sue Nicholson and Deb Webber investigate one of the most complex and intriguing cases ever featured - did Waikato man Jason Dark commit suicide or was he murdered, as his family believes?

programme.title: Sensing Murder
programme.desc: “Sensing Murder” psychics are challenged to connect with the spirit of murdered Christchurch scrap-metal dealer, John Reynolds, to discover his killer and reveal the truth surrounding the violent attack.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Out of Aces
programme.desc: Garth Doull trained to be a policeman but the lure of the race track saw him swap sides of the law to become a consummate con-man. On the 8th of September 1989, his body was found floating in Wellington harbour.

programme.title: Sensing Murder: Last Orders
programme.desc: In 1993, devoted father Kevin O'Loughlin came face to face with the dark side of sunny Nelson when he was brutally stabbed to death after a night out on the town.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Night of Terror: The Bega Schoolgirls
programme.desc: On the 6th October 1997, 14-year-old Lauren Barry and 16-year-old Nicole Collins disappeared while walking along a road near their home town of Bega, on the New South Wales south coast.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Blood Sport: The Bondi Gay Murders
programme.desc: In the late 1980s and early 1990s a series of violent murders took place near Sydney’s famous Bondi Beach.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Body in the Sports Bag
programme.desc: A young Sydney man was found guilty of strangling his ex-girlfriend and stuffing the teenager's body in a cricket bag.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: The Killer Punch / The Will of Death
programme.desc: Sometime on the evening of 19 October 1990, the flamboyantly gay Sydney socialite Ludwig Gertsch was strangled with an elastic strap in the bedroom of his lover, Mr. Vincent Esposito.

programme.title: Crime Investigation Australia: Michael Kanaan: Shoot to Kill
programme.desc: Michael Kanaan was an angry young man in a hurry to make a name for himself in Sydney’s underworld. But his volatile temper and penchant for violence soon led him to kill three men before he was finally captured in a wild shootout with Sydney police.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Wild Horses
programme.desc: Stevie and Riley clash over horse training techniques when the pressure is on to have a horse ready for sale in a day.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: The Great Temptation
programme.desc: Moira’s husband Hugh returns to Gungellan, wanting her back. Regan saves the day when she discovers that a paratyphoid outbreak on Drovers is the result of Sandra’s dirty work.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Suspicious Minds
programme.desc: When evidence mounts against Stevie, Kate starts to believe that she could be guilty of Harry Ryan’s murder. Riley reacts badly when a local trainer is revealed to be abusing his horses.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Days Of Reckoning
programme.desc: Kate learns a valuable lesson about trusting her heart when she realises she was wrong to go to the police about Stevie.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: Scratch The Surface
programme.desc: When Leo returns to the district, Stevie loses control when trying to prove he murdered Harry Ryan. Alex discovers Fiona lied about the pregnancy.

programme.title: McLeod's Daughters: For Better or Worse
programme.desc: Moira’s decision to take a shortcut leads to a dangerous petrol spill on Drovers Run. His marriage on shaky ground, Alex’s world is turned upside down when he and Stevie nearly kiss.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Harlan Kent is the CEO of the world’s largest candle manufacturer, Yankee Candle. Harlan goes undercover as Dan Johnson, a chef from Cincinnati who was forced to close his restaurant and open up a retail store but has no experience in the field.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: CEO John Tracogna goes undercover at Canada’s largest zoo to get up close and personal with endangered wildlife and the people that keep the organization running.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Stephen J. Cloobeck, the Chairman and CEO of Diamond Resorts International, is going undercover as a man pursuing his dream job in the hospitality industry.

programme.title: Undercover Boss USA
programme.desc: Rick Silva became CEO of Checkers & Rallys fast food restaurants five years ago, and immediately focused on growing the business at any cost. So he is going undercover to find even more ways to drive sales and please his guests.

programme.title: Undercover Boss Canada
programme.desc: Boss Terry Davis has been with Home Hardware Stores for 42 years. He worked his way up to the top – now he’s returning to the shop floors and factories to turn flaws into fixes.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters
programme.desc: Despite mysterious and unnerving warnings from locals, the Ghost Hunters face their fears and stay on mission: to help people confront terrifying paranormal encounters that have shaken them to their core.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Hollywood Horror Stories
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Hollywood, California to investigate the infamous Black Dahlia murder at the historic Sowden House.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Century of Haunting
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Oxford, Massachusetts to help a family in need. The house has been in the Voas family for two generations, and lots of activity has been reported, from apparitions to shadow figures.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Fighting Spirit
programme.desc: TAPS has been called to investigate a historic armory. An upcoming renovation has those involved fearful the construction might provoke lingering spirits attached to artifacts with documented violent pasts.

programme.title: Ghost Hunters: Shock Island / Asylum & Testing Lab / The Surf Hotel
programme.desc: On this episode of Ghost Hunters, TAPS travels to Scott Township, Pennsylvania to investigate the Pennsylvania Asylum and Testing Lab.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Fight Like A Girl
programme.desc: This one is close to home. Dog's target on today's hunt is the cousin of Kali, Garry Boy's caregiver. In addition, she has a reputation as a brawler. With Duane Lee still missing from the team Baby Lyssa decides she will step-up in this hunt.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Higher Power
programme.desc: In an attempt to bring the team back together, Dog recruits his pastor, Tim Storey, to be the peacemaker. As Dog begins his hunt for a young man who has trouble showing up at court, Tim has his own mission - convince Duane Lee to meet with him.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Ties That Bind
programme.desc: With Duane Lee back on the team, the rift in the Chapman clan appears over. But will time heal this wound? As the family heads out for the seedier side of Honolulu in search of an erotic dancer, we will find out if the wound is truly healed.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Who's the Boss
programme.desc: When can a bounty hunt also be a date? When Dog and Beth decide to ride in the same SUV as they pursue a run away fugitive, will their different approaches to the investigation lead to a capture and romance?

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Bus Stop Bruiser
programme.desc: When an alleged abuser goes on the lame, Dog gathers the team to bring him in. As the leads grow colder Dog's determination only grows stronger. Finally, a hot lead comes in and Dog sets the trap for his prey.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Luck Be A Lady
programme.desc: Dog and company head to the Big Island in pursuit of two courthouse no-shows only to find that one of them appears to be posting status updates from Southern California.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: Behind the Hunt
programme.desc: The cameras are turned around, as we get a tour of life "behind the scenes" on Dog the Bounty Hunter. Using interviews with Dog and the posse, the TV crew, and never before seen footage, this is one of most revealing and heartfelt episodes of the series.

programme.title: Dog The Bounty Hunter: God Looks on the Heart
programme.desc: This fugitive spells trouble for Dog in today's hunt. When the leads grow cold it's the US Postal Service to the rescue as a mail carrier lends a helping hand. Dog's team surrounds the suspected safe house and silently awaits their prey.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Return of the Beavers
programme.desc: When Phil discovers more beaver activity on the Robertson land, he recruits Jase, Jep, and Si to get rid of them. Meanwhile, Willie and Korie bring Bella to her first day of karate practice.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Duck Dynasty
programme.desc: Stumped on a way to celebrate Willie's birthday, Korie enlists the guys' help and Jase takes the reigns in planning a trip to the lake where Phil and Kay used to live. Meanwhile, the women realize a raccoon is inside the lake house.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Glory Is the Reward of Mallard
programme.desc: When Willie takes a business trip to Scotland to expand his duck call business, he brings the entire family along so they can reconnect with their Scottish roots. Willie organizes a bus tour to trace his family heritage.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Good Night and Good Duck
programme.desc: A special holiday episode of Duck Dynasty shows when the Robertson family took over the Thanksgiving special of a local TV show "Good Morning Arklamiss." Each family member presents a special holiday segment, with Willie and Jase serving as anchormen.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Quack in the Saddle
programme.desc: When Willie becomes the temporary owner of a thoroughbred, he and the guys take it to a local track and enter it into a race. Meanwhile, when Kay decides she wants to buy a new birdbath for her yard, she recruits Phil, Martin and Godwin.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: A Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: The Robertsons help a long time employee whose Mom has fallen on hard times by buying her a brand new house for Christmas. Jep, Jase, Martin and Godwin race to finish a deck in time for the big reveal, only to get sidetracked by a hammering competition.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: The Cannonball Runs
programme.desc: Jase enters an outhouse race to help promote Willie's Duck Diner, but when the Robertsons show up for the race, they face an unexpected rival - Phillip McMillan. Meanwhile, Willie attempts to create the world's greatest bologna sandwich.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Mo Math, Mo Problems
programme.desc: Willie helps Sadie with her homework by enlisting the guys to create a real-life version of a math problem, but when Jase and Willie get sidetracked helping Sadie, they rekindle an old argument of whether Jase can outrun a truck.

programme.title: Duck Dynasty: Coop! There It Is!
programme.desc: When Jep asks Willie and the guys to help move his old chicken coop into his new house, which is under renovation, Jessica takes issue with its appearance, leading the guys to yet another project - renovating the chicken coop.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: The Carcel Distrital is located in one of the most dangerous quarters of Bogotá. Nearly 950 men and 50 women are imprisoned here.

programme.title: Behind Bars: The World's Toughest Prisons
programme.desc: Once, inmates in Armenian prisons fell into the hands of the "Thieves in Law," a criminal brotherhood rejecting state authority and living by its own code.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Barbarians At The Gate
programme.desc: Philippine President Duterte has declared war on illegal drugs, but the battle now gets more complicated. In the Muslim-heavy southern regions of the country, ISIS begins to profit off large scale drug trafficking

programme.title: Drug Wars: Morocco Express
programme.desc: Spain has become the gateway for drugs entering Europe, as traffickers take advantage of the proximity between Morocco and Spain. Today, Moroccan hashish is in full harvest and ready for distribution.

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Gibraltar Connection
programme.desc: In southern Spain, the port of Algeciras has long served as a major point of entry for European goods. This iconic trading post is now being used as a backdoor to Europe’s major drug markets.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Rise of the Cartel
programme.desc: This season Drug Wars returns to the US, where along the Rio Grande the battle rages between Mexican cartels and the US Border Patrol.

programme.title: Drug Wars: A River Runs Through This
programme.desc: In Texas the Rio Grande is all that separates the US from Mexico. The Border Patrol Riverine Unit’s mission is to guard these waters and their job is getting harder and harder,

programme.title: Drug Wars: The Race is On
programme.desc: In Texas deadly high speed chases are a frequent occurrence between officers of the US Border Patrol and cartel smugglers.

programme.title: Drug Wars: Drug Store Cartels
programme.desc: In Mexico cartels are increasingly turning to the manufacture of prescription drugs, including lab-produced methamphetamines and opioids.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Stay with Me Part 2
programme.desc: Johnnie says she suspects Henri of cheating now because he acts indifferent and doesn’t come home most nights. Henri points the finger back claiming Johnnie's not only a cheater, but also enables her family members and has developed a gambling habit.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Computer Love
programme.desc: As soon as this couple got engaged their romance hit the rocks. Brandi says that Brittanie can’t tell the truth if her life depended on it. Brittanie says Brandi’s insecurities and lack of trust has had a severe effect on their relationship.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Sick and Tired
programme.desc: Timothy is tired of being kicked out the house every time Erin catches an attitude. If she kicks him out once more, he's gone for good. Erin says she dropped out of college and left behind a full tennis scholarship because of him.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Cheating Husband
programme.desc: Corey has cheated on his wife with 27 women and wants a divorce because he can't trust her. She cheated once and can't get over how she hid it from him. He also argues that his 27 times were purely physical, but hers was an emotional affair.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Grumpy Old Man
programme.desc: Michaela and Richard’s 30-year age difference has finally taken a toll on their relationship. Richard says he just wants to settle down and enjoy the rest of his life and says that Michaela’s constant nagging is making him rethink marrying her.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Speak My Truth
programme.desc: Chante says her boyfriend, Steve of 8 years is trying to end her “hot girl summer.” Not only that, but he doesn’t trust her, is controlling and wants to marry her. Chante isn’t ready for marriage and just wants to have fun.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Lesbihonest
programme.desc: Porcha has had enough of Ivory's promiscuous behavior. He claims Porcha has more tricks and secrets than Houdini and her lying has taken its toll. Can Judge Lynn Toler help this couple or is it time for Cupid to take better aiming lessons?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Angry Man
programme.desc: Kadaveion and Justice’s anger issues are tearing them apart. Kadaveion doubts he fathered their baby, but Justice says he’s a liar who gave her a STD and is ready to leave him. Can Judge Toler find a solution or have they already made up their minds?

programme.title: Divorce Court: In My Feelings
programme.desc: Raymond, also known as @IamRollingRay, is an Instagram sensation who says his high school sweetheart is jealous of his social media fan base. Christian thinks Ray shows more attention to his fanbase, accusing him of cheating with his followers.

programme.title: Divorce Court: Forever My Lady
programme.desc: Despite their age gap, Tamara and Jasimine have been together for 10 years. Tamara claims Jasimine sends risque texts to other people. Jasimine claims Tamara explodes in fits of rage. Can this couple get over their age gap?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Studs Need Love Too
programme.desc: Tahani said Cymbre's jealous fits of rage has caused her to lose a job and suspects him of cheating after finding a hotel receipt! He doesn't trust her either after she cheated before. Will this couple be able to trust again or are they too far gone?

programme.title: Divorce Court: Love on Top
programme.desc: Darnesha still madly loves Pedro even though he recently had a baby with another woman and began a new relationship with a completely different woman. She wants to make it work, but Pedro is happy with his new beau. Is a divorce inevitable?

programme.title: Operation Repo: Don't You Dare Lift-off
programme.desc: First, Froy, Matt, and Lou turn tail and bail when bats and guns are swung towards them. Later, things get heated for Matt and Sonia just before they head out with Esteban and Lou to ambush a helicopter pilot.

programme.desc: First, Lou, Lyndah, and Matt head to a cul-de-sac to gain possession of a speedboat, and a truck, and a trailer. Later, a rare collectible motorcycle is up for repo, and Matt, Lou, and Froy are ready to collect it. And finally, Froy, Sonia, and Lou nab a.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Adult Film Star
programme.desc: First, Lou, Froy, and Matt press charges after a violent debtor attacks the crew. Later, Lou, Sonia, and Froy head out to the boondocks to repo a BMW in the middle of an adult film shoot. And finally, Sonia and Lyndah ride out in Sonia's car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Pizza, Hook-ups, and a Suspicious Suitcase
programme.desc: First, Matt and Froy interrupt a young couple's romantic entanglement when they try to hook up to the car a young couple are trying to hook-up in. Next, tempers and Pizza fly when Sonia, Matt, and Lyndah repo a pizza parlor's customer's car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Exterminate or Retaliate
programme.desc: First, Lou calls in an exterminator and has Froy, Sonia, and Lyndah go to an address to ambush them for their truck. Next, Matt, Froy, and Lou bring the debtors to the ground when they head out to repo a back hoe tractor.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Unwanted Seizures
programme.desc: First, Lou sends Sonia and Matt to repo a Toyota Corolla from a recently divorced debtor determined to keep the car she won in the divorce. Later, Lou cuts a repo short to send Froy and Matt to tail a car until the debtor realizes he's being followed. And

programme.title: Operation Repo: Pepper Spray and Guns
programme.desc: First, Froy and Sonia douse a couple with a dose of pepper spray when the debtor gets too pushy with Sonia. Next, Matt and Froy battle biker girls when going after a motorcycle. And Finally, Matt and Froy confront a couple of delinquents.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Who Wants Ice Cream?
programme.desc: First, Sonia, Matt, Froy, and Lou roll up and roll on a gang of brothers to gain possession of an Infinity. Next, Matt and Froy stand in the way of a drugged debtor keeping his car. And finally, it's time for some ice cream for Lou, Froy, and Sonia when..

programme.title: Operation Repo: The Cop, the Pizza Delivery Man, and the Repo Men
programme.desc: First, Lou sends Sonia and Froy out to repo from a pizza delivery man way behind on his payments. Then, Matt and Froy deal with an unhelpful citizen when they have to repossess from a cop. And finally, Sonia, Lyndah, and Matt deal with another repo.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Hairy Situations
programme.desc: First, things get hairy when Sonia and Lyndah repo from outside a wig shop. Next, everybody's crying when Lou and Froy's repossession from a young couple ends with a pepper spray to everyone's face. And finally, Froy, Sonia, and Lou repo the targeted car.

programme.title: Operation Repo: Legal Repossession
programme.desc: First, Matt, Froy, and Lou do a legal repossession of an attorney's car. Next, Froy, Lyndah, and Sonia are speechless when they interrupt two girls in the back of a car. And finally, Lou and Sonia wrangle with a bunch of confused ATV owners blindsided by

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: From a Woman
programme.desc: Danni has second thoughts about asking Preston for space when it doesn't look or feel the way she thought it would. (S3, ep18)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: The Wild Card
programme.desc: When Andi blends her work life with her personal life, it opens up a world of unforeseen issues. (S3, ep19)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Sistas: We Got Time
programme.desc: An eye-opening conversation with Calvin causes Danni to view relationships differently, including her own. (S3, ep20)

programme.title: The Game: Baby B.S.
programme.desc: Kelly is happy when she finds out Jason wants to have another baby. But when Tasha offers her a job at her management firm, Kelly has a quick change of heart.

programme.title: The Game: God Bless The Girl That's Got Her Own
programme.desc: When Melanie gives temporary shelter to a Sunbeam whose boyfriend has left her high and dry, Melanie begins to feel uncomfortable about being completely dependent on Derwin for financial security.

programme.title: The Game: You Say You Want A Revolution
programme.desc: When Camille, the wife of the newest star Saber, joins the Sunbeams, she decides to run against Kelly for president.

programme.title: The Game: The Big Chill
programme.desc: Tasha's boyfriend Kenny confronts her about her aggressive attitude, and asks her to tone it down when he introduces her to his group of friends.

programme.title: The Game: The Many Lives Of Derwin Davis
programme.desc: When Derwin is unexpectedly forced to take Melanie to singer Drew Sidora's video release party, he panics over how the meeting between them is going to turn out.

programme.title: The Game: When The Chickens Come Home To Roost, Part I
programme.desc: During EPSY week in Los Angeles, Derwin gets an unexpected endorsement deal and is left to celebrate with Drew Sidora, while Melanie is busy studying in San Diego.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Devil in Syracuse
programme.desc: The clients are new, but the spirit is all too familiar as Ryan Buell prepares himself to battle the taunting demon that has been following him.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Dead Legends
programme.desc: PRS and Psychic/Medium Chip Coffey investigate the famed Hotel Conneaut in northern Pennsylvania. Heavy doors opening on their own, sightings of a boy, a bride and a menacing butcher have the hotel's staff on edge.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Hostage to Fear
programme.desc: P.R.S. is summoned to help a family who has been haunted for years by spirits lurking in the house. Upon arrival the team finds a family that has become prisoners in their own home.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Vendetta
programme.desc: P.R.S. investigates claims of supernatural revenge in the Pennsylvania Poconos. When a client's new boyfriend moves in, does the paranormal move in with him? Or did her ex put a hex on her house and the entire family?

programme.title: Paranormal State: Boy Pushed Me
programme.desc: Bruce and Danielle are terrified by an EVP recorded in their Indiana home stating "Kill them." Even more chilling, their toddler son survived a fall out of a window only to tell his parents, "Boy pushed me."

programme.title: Paranormal State: Church of the Damned
programme.desc: Jason and his family can no longer do renovations of an abandoned Kansas church, especially after they found their father in the basement crying and frightened because of the menacing activity.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Room & Board
programme.desc: The owners of a vacation lodge in the remote town of North Hudson, NY, feel their woodsy getaway is plagued by negative spirits.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Anniversary
programme.desc: Ever since a close-knit Kentucky family moved into their new home, they've been visited by the spirit of a young girl.

programme.title: Paranormal State: Get Out of This House
programme.desc: When an aggressive spirit stalks a young family, PRS is called in to investigate. When it is determined that the source of the haunting may have been unknowingly invited in, Ryan races to identify and hopefully defeat the entity before it's too late.

programme.title: Paranormal State: The Sickness
programme.desc: Something is making Lisa and her family sick. Is it natural or paranormal? Ryan and the team uncover the tragic history surrounding Lisa's home--with shocking connections to respiratory illness.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Abbey House Museum
programme.desc: Yvette introduces a brand new Most Haunted team member, Watson, a bulldog. This location starts to give up its mysteries as soon as the team arrive and they have go film differently to accommodate a particularly aggressive poltergeist.

programme.title: Most Haunted: Wentworth Woodhouse stable
programme.desc: The first team ever to be allowed into the very haunted Wentworth Woodhouse Stable Block and the team film the best evidence ever, has a ghost been caught on camera? Watson sees something and team see someone who couldn’t possibly have been there.

programme.title: Most Haunted: The Slaughter House
programme.desc: The Slaughterhouse is Liverpool’s oldest pub and gives the team more than they bargained for as object are moved from underneath the team’s noses.

programme.title: Highway to Heaven: Ghost Rider

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: Commander Adama is critically injured when Cylon warriors carry out a kamikaze-like mission against the Battlestar Galactica, causing a raging inferno aboard the ship and threatening the lives of the last survivors of the human race.

programme.title: Battlerstar Galactica
programme.desc: An alien joins the Galactica fleet, attracting its people, including Apollo’s girlfriend, Sheba, with mysterious powers and promises of a successful end to their search for Earth.

programme.title: Green Eyed Killers
programme.desc: Teenager Jay Sewell's life was taken in a brutal attack orchestrated by jealous Daniel Grogan, who had heard that Jay was seeing his former girlfriend.

programme.title: Green Eyed Killers: NEW Alice Ruggles
programme.desc: 24-year-old Alice Ruggles was murdered by her jealous ex-boyfriend when he climbed in through an open window and slashed her throat six times, almost cutting through to her spine.

programme.title: Survivors With Denise Welch

programme.title: Survivors With Denise Welch
programme.desc: At the age of three, Christopher was placed in the care of Eunice Spry, a pillar of the Jehovah's Witness community in Gloucestershire. For over 13 years Eunice systematically tortured Christopher and some of her other foster children.

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Alien Achilles Heel. Many believe aliens are already here on Earth. Could they be plotting an attack? And if so, can humans survive their weapons' terrifying capabilities?

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed

programme.title: Alien Files Unsealed
programme.desc: Is biological life merely a stepping stone for a universe dominated by alien artificial intelligence?

programme.title: World's Greatest: Ancient Cities
programme.desc: In Ancient Cities, we journey to these ancestors of influence such as Luang Prabang, Vienna, and Istanbul where religious and cultural centers have shaped the ways in which we view the world around us and continue to do so in modern times.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Lost Cities
programme.desc: Once powerful and populous centers of influence, these lost cities are providing clues to how our ancestors existed in the world and remind us that ancient civilizations were not so far removed from our own.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Capital Cities
programme.desc: With visionaries, politicians, and activists, these metropolises are defined as the official seats of government. Dublin, Washington, and Taipei share broad avenues, museums, and monuments, but are as varied as the countries they represent.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Glaciers
programme.desc: Clinging to the world’s highest mountains and forming ice caps on both poles, glaciers leave an impression on the landscape and on all who bear witness to their splendor.

programme.title: World's Greatest: Water Adventures
programme.desc: We are captivated by oceans, rivers, and lakes - the power, the flow, the reflective stillness. And as we seek to get closer, we immerse ourselves in an expanding range of aquatic experiences.

programme.title: Arthur: Mom and Dad Have A Great Big Fight/D.W.'s Perfect Wish
programme.desc: When Mom and Dad fight over spilled milk, Arthur and D.W. fear the worst. Is it Arthur's fault or D.W.'s? Then, turning five is a major, big deal event! But D.W. worries that she fribbled away her preschool years on meaningless pursuits.

programme.title: Arthur: Flea to Be You and Me/Kiss and Tell
programme.desc: Pal is itching like crazy and the culprit is Pepe, an Italian circus flea. Then, Emily returns from her summer in Paris with the amazing news that she's been kissed .... by a boy! Now can D.W. find her own Prince Charming?

programme.title: Arthur: Vomitrocious!/Sue Ellen Chickens Out
programme.desc: It's just a regular day until Francine starts to feel queasy, and then throws up in the cafeteria! Now Francine is afraid to go back to school. And, Sue Ellen learns that a fast-food chain is taking over the beloved Sugar Bowl.

programme.title: Arthur: Sue Ellen's Lost Diary/Arthur's Knee
programme.desc: Poor Sue Ellen has lost the one thing she's never without--her diary. Then, Arthur's hurt his knee but won't tell Mom--because then she'd know he'd been playing down at the dump , where he was NOT allowed to go.

programme.title: Arthur: Silent Treatment/Kung Fool
programme.desc: When shy George wonders if any of his friends notice him, he decides he won’t speak to anyone until they do! Fern volunteers to help an elderly neighbor with his household chores, and then discovers his past life as a Kung Fu celebrity.

programme.title: Arthur: My Dad, The Garbage Man/Poor Muffy
programme.desc: Mr. Ratburn's class is taking a field trips to visit parents at their jobs. Francine's not sure she wants the class to know her dad is a garbage man. And a new carpet and a sneezing attack means Muffy must spend the weekend at Francine's.

programme.title: Arthur: I'm A Poet/The Scare-Your-Pants-Off Club
programme.desc: Challenged by Fern to enter a poetry contest, Arthur and his friends each write a poem to be judged by the famous poet Jack Prelutsky. Then, Arthur and his friends develop a consuming passion for the Scare-Your-Pants-Off books.

programme.title: Arthur: Arthur Rides The Bandwagon/Dad's Dessert Dilemma
programme.desc: Woogles have their own names and personalities and they're so darned cute! And Arthur's gotta have one, especially now that everyone is collecting them. Arthur wouldn't mind if Dad's infamous dessert "experiments" remained a family secret.

programme.title: Arthur: Dear Adil/Bitzi's Break-Up
programme.desc: Arthur is worried that his letters to his new Turkish pen pal, Adil, will be boring. After all, how can Elwood City compare to Arthur's fantastical ideas about Turkey? Bitzi is breaking up with her boyfriend, and Buster is really sad.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Commerce Raiders
programme.desc: Heavily armed vessels disguised as ordinary cargo ships patrolled allied waters, sinking supply boats and stealing their content.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: Bombing of Germany
programme.desc: The development of the B-17 bomber, which allowed American planes to reach inside Germany and bomb its cities.

programme.title: Battlefront: WWII Road To Victory: U-Boat War
programme.desc: U-boats posed the deadliest threat to Allied convoys traveling the Atlantic.

programme.title: Battle for the Bulge
programme.desc: The Battle for the Bulge was the last major German offensive move on the Western Front during the Second World War.

programme.title: Battle of Britain
programme.desc: To commemorate the 70th Anniversary of the Battle of Britain Ewan and Colin McGregor take to the skies to discover how; against the odds, the RAF inflicted Hitler's first defeat of WW2.

programme.title: Battle of Britain - Empty Skies
programme.desc: Tells the story of 19 men and women who were there. Through a series of filmed interviews their stories have been preserved, allowing them to tell the part they played in the nation's defence in their own words creating a unique collection of accounts.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Alante has spent the last 8 years planning a life with his online love Nevaeh. She's perfect but her disappearances have Alante worried. Nev and Max help to uncover a mysterious truth that affects Alante's entire town.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: Fans of popular YouTube star Andrea Russett call on Nev and Max to help catch a potential stalker who is impersonating Andrea's family online. What the guys uncover will shock even them. (S5, ep17)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show
programme.desc: David is the only love Andria has ever known. Love letters and voice messages make Andria stay. But having never met after 10 years, she needs to know what he is hiding that keeps him away.

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Anthony & Marq
programme.desc: Anthony is a war veteran who wears his heart on his sleeve. Over a year ago, he bonded online with a caring man named Marq. Today, they're head over heels in love - but what is Marq hiding? (S2, ep2)

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Antoinette & Albert
programme.desc: A year after meeting 'T-lights' on Instagram, 'instaceleb' Antoinette is ready to meet him, but he always brushes off the idea. Is he really the online celebrity he claims to be?

programme.title: Catfish: The TV Show: Antwane & Tony
programme.desc: Nev and Max are contacted by Carmen who is sounding the alarm on behalf of her cousin, Antwane. He's been in a 3-year romance with a man named Tony that he met on a telephone chat line. (S3, ep2)

programme.title: Jersey Shore: Family Vacation: The Speech Pt. 2
programme.desc: Angelina's wedding reception erupts into chaos after Deena, Jenni and Nicole deliver their speech. The girls are horrified, Angelina snaps, and the guys try to make things right. But the damage done may be well beyond repair.

programme.title: Ex on the Beach
programme.desc: The rollercoaster of love continues as Chloe and Sam face more ups and downs, Max gets bored of Stevie and finds fun elsewhere, and the arrival of a new Ex sends Georgia and Brad off track. (S7, ep7)

programme.title: Ex on the Beach

programme.title: Ex on the Beach

programme.title: 48 Hours

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Preacher's Passion
programme.desc: A preacher searches for answers about his girlfriend's death.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Tacoma Confidential
programme.desc: A report on corruption and a cover-up by city officials of Tacoma, Washington, focusing on David Brame, the city’s police chief who rose to power despite a shady past.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Dog Trainer, The Heiress, and the Bodyguard - Part 1
programme.desc: When a celebrity dog trainer is murdered, an heiress fears for her life and a bodyguard vows to be a hero.

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Dog Trainer, The Heiress, and the Bodyguard - Part 2
programme.desc: When a celebrity dog trainer is murdered, an heiress fears for her life and a bodyguard vows to be a hero.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Fakeout
programme.desc: Anastas Poltroni is the head of an international narcotics syndicate, and has taken refuge in a country with no extradition treaty. The IM Force is assigned to lure him out.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Wheels
programme.desc: In the country of Valeria, the IMF must assure that the corrupt Nationalist party's rigged voting machine doesn't give them the election.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: The Ransom
programme.desc: Mobster Frank Egan kidnaps the daughter of Dan's friend and uses her as a hostage to force Dan and the team to break out a key witness, Augie Gorman, against him.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Elena
programme.desc: Double-agent Elena Del Barra is acting bizarrely, sending a microfilm of defense secrets from her own country. Rollin is sent in to investigate and return the microfilm without its theft ever being detected.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible: Zubrovnik's Ghost
programme.desc: The wife of a deceased scientist, Kurt Zubrovnik, is being pressured by Eastern forces to work for them.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Here Kitty, Kitty
programme.desc: When Miss Jo loses her cat, Barney and the children spend the day helping her find it. Along the way, they learn all about cats.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ’s efforts to decorate the park go awry when he accidentally paints the caboose several different colors. Baby Bop can’t wait for BJ and Riff to go on their camping trip.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: BJ is pretending to be a great detective, and needs a mystery to solve! Barney sees Riff protecting a nest full of duck eggs.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The Blame Game - Airplanes
programme.desc: Marcos accidentally breaks an art show project that Melanie has made. Afraid that she will be angry, he doesn't say anything, but then feels guilty. Barney helps him see that honesty and taking responsibility for what we do is always best. together.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Big Brother Rusty
programme.desc: Barney's excited to find out that Rusty's family is adopting a new baby girl from China; however, Rusty feels differently. He's not sure if he's going to be a good brother, and he doesn't know much about China.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: Barney and Friends
programme.desc: Baby Bop is surprised by the first day of cold weather, Barney helps her see that winter is a wonderful time. On a hot summer day, Barney teaches BJ about all the activities you can do in the summer.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: The New Kid - The Princess And The Frog
programme.desc: When Riff meets a new friend in the park, BJ feels a little left out. BJ goes to great lengths to try to find a new friend for himself. Barney helps BJ see that we don't have to forget old friends when we make new ones.

programme.title: Barney and Friends: My Friends the Doctor
programme.desc: Time for a check-up! Barney helps his friends discover the world of doctors and dentists as they learn about healthy habits like brushing teeth, getting checkups, eating healthy foods and getting exercise.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Viva la Vegas
programme.desc: 1974 death-defying Zig Zag magic sword box, an ultra-rare 1910 poster of the infamous magician Chung Ling Soo, an 1800s naval cane sword and century-old Metlach German beer steins.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Without a Chute
programme.desc: After a tough auction, things get worse when the shop's landlord wants to talk to the guys. Ton tries to negotiate with him while Allen has to put an experimental powered parachute to the test to save the day's profits.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gangster Whiskey
programme.desc: Allen and Ton trek to an auction in Moreno Valley, CA, where two locker wins yield a vintage jukebox, a valuable baseball card and a Prohibition-era moonshine still.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen vs. Ton
programme.desc: When Ton and Allen find themselves bidding against each other at an auction, the former partners battle it out in an epic showdown that leaves the fate of the pawnshop and their friendship in question.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Carnies & Armories
programme.desc: A tough group of bidders team up to take down Ton and Allen at auction. After a couple of wins, the guys try to sell an arsenal used by Native Americans and some vintage carnival gear. But will they get conned?

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Louisiana Purchase
programme.desc: In Louisiana, Ton and Allen encounter some salty locals at a shipping crate auction, and navigate choppy waters at a boat auction. After spending a lot of cash, they find a tactical blast shield and a bass fishing boat.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Allen's Got Balls
programme.desc: After returning to LA, Ton & Allen head deep into hostile auction hunter territory and butt heads with a familiar old foe! They discover a driving range golf ball picker vehicle and one of the most accurate rifles ever made!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Gone in 20 Seconds
programme.desc: Ton and Allen get taken down by their fiercest opponent, CJ, but a twist of fate keeps the guys in the game. They uncover a Geiger counter and NASCAR impact wrenches, while their accountant delivers some shocking news.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Haff-Inated
programme.desc: Allen's off his game without his morning coffee, but some fun items help him re-energize. The guys find a wrestling ring, and when Allen uncovers vintage animatronics, they remind him of his days as a theme park boat captain.

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Cold Hard Cash
programme.desc: Ton and Allen go North to Alaska and get a cold reception from the local auctioneer. They find two enormous seaplane pontoons and a pair of Smith & Wesson revolvers, including the most powerful production handgun in the world!

programme.title: Auction Hunters: Sink or Swim
programme.desc: 1905 Hand-crank Thomas Edison gramophone with cylindrical records; a discontinued Addictor 190 Mini Boat; a rare 1897 Regina music box.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Catelynn and Tyler celebrate Nova's birthday and consider having another baby, while Farrah makes a decision about her and Sophia's future. Amber and Gary throw Leah a birthday party. (S6, ep18)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Amber continues to be frustrated that she doesn't have Leah as much as she wants, while Ryan's girlfriend encourages him to communicate more with Maci about Bentley's schedule. (S6, ep19)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Maci confides in Ryan's fiance about her co-parenting issues, while Amber plans a fashion show to promote her boutique. Catelynn and Tyler face up to their different parenting styles. (S6, ep20)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Tyler decides to be more optimistic about Butch while Farrah questions her mum's relationship with her fiance. Ryan's family finds out something that Maci's been keeping from them. (S6, ep21)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: The mums and their significant others travel to Puerto Rico where Maci struggles with wanting to help Ryan overcome his issues. Farrah is invited to speak about her businesses at SXSW. (S6, ep23)

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: Maci and Taylor work on their marriage in counselling while Farrah goes on a date with Asaf whom she picked on the aftershow. Gary asks Amber to help him surprise Leah with a new house. (S6, ep24)

programme.title: CSI: New York: Brooklyn 'Til I Die
programme.desc: A role-playing game turns lethal, with one player falling victim to a bona fide killer and the other kidnapped and held for ransom.

programme.title: CSI: New York: The Ripple Effect
programme.desc: When the CSIs investigate two seemingly unrelated deaths, their separate trails of evidence lead to a surprisingly connected conclusion.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Kill Screen
programme.desc: The CSIs find themselves immersed in the world of competitive video gaming when they discover a murder may be related to a high-stakes tournament.

programme.title: CSI: New York: Flash Pop

programme.title: CSI: New York: Sláinte

programme.title: CSI: New York: Unwrapped
programme.desc: The CSIs are called to a Brooklyn housing project to investigate the murder of a successful businessman who felt the pull of his old neighborhood.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: See No Evil
programme.desc: A young girl is kidnapped and the CSIs' only witness is a blind man, who heard the abduction, leading Horatio to an old nemesis.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Manhunt
programme.desc: When the killer of Horatio's wife busts out of prison and goes on a rampage, they must determine what he's after and find him before he strikes again.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Reality Kills

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Sleepless In Miami

programme.title: CSI: Miami: Blood Sugar
programme.desc: When a sugar refinery explodes, Horatio Caine and the CSI team make a shocking discovery about one of the factory's employees.

programme.title: CSI: Miami: On The Hook

programme.title: Very Scary People: NEW The Dating Game Killer: Smooth Talker (Part 1)

programme.title: Very Scary People: NEW The Dating Game Killer: The Bite Mark (Part 2)
programme.desc: With a string of murders already behind him, Rodney Alcala is chosen to appear on the game show, “The Dating Game.” What happens next makes him one of the most horrific killers in US history.

programme.title: Ice Cold Killers: Frozen In Fear

programme.title: Sins & Secrets: Lafayette

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Quarantine Episode

programme.desc: Lindsey auditions to dance for a famous rapper's music video, but she later backs out after meeting with the powerful, demanding choreographer.

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Career Day Episode

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The House Sitter's Episode

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Nick Gets Promoted Episode

programme.title: Are We There Yet?: The Big Loan Episode

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: En kvinne i en affære på skrittet forteller en historie om et sett langt i fremtiden, i en fullstendig puritansk verden, der alle frihetene vi tar for gitt er så og si forbudt. En verden hvor dans og musikk, kjærlighet og begjær er de eneste reglene.

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: Bobby kryper tilbake i livet til Elizabeth, en blind radiopersonlighet sent på kvelden, og forfører sin tekniker Francis. Ved soloppgang er Bobby borte, Elizabeth er alene i mørket sitt mens Francis har lært å omfavne lyset.

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: Rita blir revet mellom to elskere som er bestevenner som ikke vil dele, når en piknik blir til en komisk dans av hvem som vil hvem og hvem som vil hvem døde til hun snakker dem inn i et kompromiss som gir henne alt hun vil.

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: En fordømt engel blir forferdet over å innse at han er forbannet med den forræderske makten til å drepe med et kyss og må gå på jorden alene og borte fra kjærligheten, for alltid.

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: En kvinne som leter etter løslatelse fra den pressede jobben finner en mann som leter etter det samme. Beskyttelse og ingen navn er reglene for tirsdags- og torsdagssaken. Kvinnen setter krydder på affæren..

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: En kvinne kan ikke unngå å legge merke til en attraktiv mann, i en kontorbygning ved siden av hennes. Etter hvert begynner han å sende henne erotiske fakser, og hun svarer.

programme.title: Red Shoe Diaries
programme.desc: Jake får et brev fra en politidame. Hun forteller ham at det er en fyr hun er interessert i, men legger ikke merke til henne. Så hun bestemmer seg for å ta initiativet ved å arrestere og ta ham et sted og legge han i håndjern...

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Resurrection
programme.desc: Doors makes a public appearance, leading to an increase in anti-Taelon sentiment. The Taelon Synod is fed up with Da'an and sends Zo'or in his stead.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Horizon Zero

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Scopions Dream
programme.desc: Dr. Larry Clark is a bio engineer who works on the skrills. When the companions decide to get rid of a series, one of them joins with Clark.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Live Free or Die
programme.desc: Navy Seal major Raymond McIntyre kidnaps Da'an and demands to know where his men are. They were involved in a inter-dimensional space flight test that went wrong.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: The Scarecrow Returns
programme.desc: Research continues on the 'scarecrow' probe. Boone starts learning Taelon to interpret its messages. The device meanwhile absorbs a scientist, Rayna.

programme.title: Earth: Final Conflict: Sandoval's Run
programme.desc: Sandoval's CVI is breaking down. While Dr. Belman tries to remove it before implanting a new one, Sandoval escapes. He wants to rescue his wife DeeDee.

programme.title: The Lost World: Prodigal Father
programme.desc: The explorers find trouble when they help save and aid a man they believe is Veronica's long lost father on the run from Kartas, a bounty hunter.

programme.title: The Lost World: Birthright
programme.desc: Summerlee, Roxton, and Veronica must outrun a T-rex that's tracking them for dinner. Meanwhile Marguerite, Malone, and Challenger are manipulated by Ramses to help him take his place as pharaoh.

programme.title: The Lost World: Resurrection
programme.desc: Malone and Veronica must defend the treehouse from mercenaries. After being ambushed by Norse warriors, Roxton must take the life of another in order to rise from the dead and save Marguerite.

programme.title: The Lost World: The Chosen One
programme.desc: Roxton is determined to help the chosen one find his way back to the elders and save the star of hope. Veronica and the others worry when Malone begins spending time with a strange women.

programme.title: The Lost World: Prophecy
programme.desc: A fortune teller gives the explorers startling predictions that prove eerily accurate, with Malone receiving a grim fortune Meanwhile Challenger and Summerlee try and evade highly-evolved raptors.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Robert Bathurst and Amanda Donohue team up with experts Philip Serrrell and David Harper. They take their classic cars on a ride through Norfolk and Lincolnshire, hunting for hidden treasure and learning the dark secret of Valentine's Day.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: TV presenter Janet Ellis and her pop-star daughter Sophie Ellis Bextor travel from Essex to Yorkshire with Philip Serrell and Will Axon. On the way, Janet hears about a long-lost soldier and Sophie pays homage to the humble honeybee.

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: Rosemary Shrager and Jean-Christophe Novelli hit the road in a classic Ford Mustang. Margie Cooper and Paul Laidlaw help the chefs sift through bargains in Yorkshire, but will a passion for cookery-themed items land the chefs in hot water?

programme.title: Celebrity Antiques Road Trip
programme.desc: It's 80's superstar turned gardener Kim Wilde vs. Home Front in The Garden visionary Diarmuid Gavin. Helping them cut through the antiques undergrowth from Hertfordshire to Cheshire--in a Jaguar XJS--are Jonathan Pratt and Will Axon.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Be My Valentine

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Home Sweet Home
programme.desc: It's never a quiet life for our teen mums. Sassi plasters over the cracks, Megan prepares for her big day, Amber's love life is in tatters, Chloe buys a house and the all-new Mia is here! (S2, ep4)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Labour And Love
programme.desc: More tears, tiffs and true love in Teen Mom UK. Megan has a baby, Amber has a meltdown, and romance is in the air for Mia. Sassi celebrates her 1st Mother's Day and Chloe tackles her weight. (S2, ep5)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Lads Trip
programme.desc: Megan welcomes a new addition to the family... a horse! Chloe heads to the gym while Jordan heads to Amsterdam. There are fireworks for Amber and Ste, and Sassi plans a Christening. (S2, ep6)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Making Memories
programme.desc: Sassi almost misses her own Christening, Amber helps Ste celebrate his big day, Chloe remembers what it's like being a teenager, Megan makes a decision and Mia is left feeling frustrated. (S2, ep7)

programme.title: Teen Mom UK: Now Or Never
programme.desc: In the season finale it's make or break for Megan and Dylan and you'll never guess who's going on a date! As Sassi boards a plane, Mia jumps out of one. Chloe treats herself, big time. (S2, ep8)

programme.title: 48 Hours: The Mystery of Slide Mountain
programme.desc: A report that examines evidence and unanswered questions regarding a June 1, 1998 auto accident on Slide Mountain, near Reno, Nevada, that led to the death of Rinette Riella Bergna and left the driver, Rinette’s husband Peter with only minor injuries.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Love, Hate & Obsession
programme.desc: In the investigation of the murder of a one-time millionaire, both his ex-wife and his son are suspects.

programme.title: 48 Hours: Expert Witness

programme.title: Children of the Corn
programme.desc: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed. Starring: Peter Horton, Linda Hamilton, R.G. Armstrong, John Franklin, Courtney Gains

programme.title: Children of the Corn II
programme.desc: A journalist and his son travel to Nebraska to investigate the mysterious town of Gatlin where, unbeknownst to them, a murderous cult of children are still waiting in the corn fields. Starring: Terence Knox, Paul Scherrer, Ryan Bollman

programme.title: Children of the Corn III: Urban Harvest
programme.desc: Soon after a childless couple adopts a pair of orphaned brothers, it becomes alarmingly clear that the boys are much more than they seem!

programme.title: Children of the Corn
programme.desc: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed. Starring: Peter Horton, Linda Hamilton, R.G. Armstrong, John Franklin, Courtney Gains

programme.title: Terror Train
programme.desc: Three years after a prank that went terribly awry, the six college students responsible are targeted by a masked killer at a New Year's Eve party aboard a moving train. Starring: Ben Johnson, Jamie Lee Curtis, Hart Bochner, David Copperfield

programme.title: Return of the Swamp Thing
programme.desc: Everyone's favourite muck-encrusted plant-man is back in this tongue-in-cheek action-adventure which was the sequel to the original cult classic Swamp Thing and based on the award-winning D.C. Comics series. Starring: Heather Locklear, Louis Jourdan

programme.title: Haunt
programme.desc: On Halloween, a group of friends visit an "extreme" haunted house that promises to feed their darkest fears. The night turns deadly as they realize that some monsters are real.

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: Scary and sexy in equal measure, Ali Cobrin (Bad Neighbours) stars in Girl House, a shocking slasher for the digital age. Kylie moves into an infamous house that streams content to an X-rated website.

programme.title: Halloween Night
programme.desc: Halloween Night, 1982, an inmate of a maximum security facility escapes after murdering two guards. Upon returning to the house where he was born, he goes on a killing spree that will make him Southern California's greatest mass murderer.

programme.title: Bram Stoker's Van Helsing
programme.desc: England, 1897. Van Helsing receives a letter requesting his urgent assistance in the northern town of Whitby and follows the trail to the coffin of Count Dracula himself. A fresh take on the legend of Dracula through the eyes of his greatest enemy.

programme.title: A Werewolf In England
programme.desc: Two people take refuge from a storm at a remote countryside Inn. They soon uncover a deadly pact between the strange Innkeepers and flesh-hungry werewolves. The guests must band together and fight tooth and nail to survive the night!

programme.title: An American Werewolf in Paris
programme.desc: An American man unwittingly gets involved with French werewolves who are able to transform at will.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E15 - Won't Get Fooled Again
programme.desc: Crichton has returned to Earth. Or has he always been on Earth all this time? People from his past and present appear.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E16 - The Locket
programme.desc: A temporal distortion traps Aeryn and John on a planet's surface, where they live out the rest of their lives.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E17 - The Ugly Truth
programme.desc: Crais and Talyn return. The crew are put on trial for an attack that Talyn made on an alien ship.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E18 - A Clockwork Nebari
programme.desc: A Nebari group comes aboard Moya and attempts to mind cleanse everyone using a drug. Pilot and Rygel are the only two who can resist the effects.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E19 - Liars, Guns And Money, Part 1: A Not So Simple Plan
programme.desc: D'Argo finally gets a lead on his son, Jothee. He will do anything to get him back, but Jothee will be sold as a slave.

programme.title: Farscape: Farscape: S2 E20 - Liars, Guns And Money, Part 2: With Friends Like These
programme.desc: With the loot from the Depository heist at hand, D'Argo anxiously waits to make contact with the Slave Traders.
